statements: DELETE FROM pesticide_usage WHERE crop_name = 'Tomato' AND impact_on_health = 'Low';
DELETE FROM pesticide_usage WHERE quantity_used > 1000 AND usage_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM crop_health WHERE crop_id = 100 AND date = '2022-10-15';
DELETE FROM PesticideUsage WHERE usage_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity_used > 100;
DELETE FROM pesticide_usage WHERE crop_id = 1 AND application_quantity > 100;
DELETE FROM crop_health WHERE health_status = 'Poor' AND observation_date < '2022-01-01';
